section.title: Installing JBoss Tools Plugins
section.para: The BPEL Tools plugin can be installed into Eclipse from the JBoss Tools update site. For more information, please read the Getting Started Guide.

section.title: Installing BPEL Tools in JBoss Developer Studio
section.para: The BPEL Tools plugin is not officially supported in JBoss Developer Studio 4.0, but is available as a separate download from the technical preview Eclipse update site.
Instructions for accessing the the technical preview update site can be found in the Getting Started Guide.
